'''Hydro Mimic Raptors''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble normal [[Wildlife#Falcons|Falcons]]. They are airborne enemies that swoop at players from above, capable of dealing great [[knockback]] or [[poise]] damage. They take more damage from {{Electro}}.
